Zoomable - Interface in org.jfree.chart.plot
A plot that is zoomable must implement this interface to provide a mechanism for user interface components to control the zooming.
zoomAroundAnchor - Variable in class org.jfree.chart.swing.ChartPanel
A flag that controls whether zoom operations are centred on the current anchor point, or the centre point of the relevant axis.
zoomButtonMasks - Variable in class org.jfree.chart.swing.ChartPanel
The masks for mouse events to trigger zooming, per mouse button.
